original_title: The Ransom of Red Chief: The New Generation
overview: This is the story of a big city child abduction gone wrong. When a young prodigy is kidnapped, his abductors find out they are in for more than they ever bargained. Instead of receiving a ransom, they find themselves on the wrong side of the extortion and having to pay the parents to take their child back! Based on a story by O'Henry.
title: The Ransom of Red Chief: The New Generation
